mapper.insert: INSERT INTO collect (id, user_id, target_id, folder_id, target_type, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{targetId}, #{folderId}, #{targetType}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE status = VALUES(status), folder_id = VALUES(folder_id), update_time = NOW()
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND target_id = #{targetId} AND target_type = #{targetType}
mapper.select: SELECT target_id FROM collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND target_type = #{targetType} AND status = 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM collect WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND target_type = #{targetType} AND status = 1
